This article is about cooked chompy. For the raw version, see Raw chompy.
Cooked chompy

Item ID2878

Cooked chompy is an ogre delicacy obtained by skewering a raw chompy with an iron spit, then cooking the skewered chompy on a fire, requiring level 30 Cooking and granting 100 experience when successful. Players may burn the chompy while cooking one, resulting in a ruined chompy; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 99 on both ranges and fires.

Cooked chompy heals 10 Hitpoints. If hunting chompy birds, due to the meat's weight of 10 kg, it is recommended to do so south-west of Castle Wars. Big Chompy Bird Hunting is required to hunt them.

2. Cook the Skewered chompy on a fire to finish a cooked chompy
